name: Yummy Land Sweet
description:
New innovative candy game comes!
Objectives differ in over 100 levels. Make matches of 3 or more candies, create candy blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging.
Start your sweet jelly journey in this puzzle adventure!
Yummy Land Sweet features:
• Sweet and shining candies!
• Over 100 interesting levels
• Multiple game goals, time mode, move mode, and more
• Very small size but tasty graphics
